title: Bounding volume collision detection with THREE.js
summary: This article shows how to implement collision detection between bounding boxes and spheres using the Three.js library. It is assumed that before reading this you have read our 3D collision detection introductory article first, and have basic knowledge about Three.js.
short_title: Bounding volume collision detection with THREE.js
